showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:1}); // “HEY…someone's IN here…
Don't look!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:5}); // “Huh?
You'll really give me some?
Thanks.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // “Phew, I feel better now.
This is for your kindness.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // Received Key Item "Sexy Cologne"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // “What is this?
Oh well.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // “It didn't do a thing,
but thanks anyways.
Here, this is for your kindness.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // Received Key Item "Flower Cologne"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:2}); // “Got any medicine on you?
I'm too hyper…and…ugh.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // “Hey, could you do somethin' for me?
Someone's been in there all day
and they're not comin' out.
I can't hold it anymore!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // “Yes? If you want to order,
do it at the counter.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // {Aeris}
“Excuse us, are you the father of
the girl at the Clothing Store?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // “I own the Clothes Shop…
but I ain't your father.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // “I don't make men's clothes.
And I don't feel like makin'
anything right now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:22}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud},
you wait over there for a second.
I'll try and talk to him.”{PAUSE}“Why don't you go over there
and have something to drink.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // {Aeris}
“You know, Mister.”{PAUSE}“He always said that just once,
he'd like to dress up like a girl.”{PAUSE}“So, that's why I wanted
a cute dress for him…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // “What!?
A tough lookin' guy like that?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // {Aeris}
“So, how 'bout it?
Will you make him one?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // “…might be interesting.
I was gettin' a little bored
just makin' regular clothes.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Aeris}
“Then you'll do it for us?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // “Yeah, all right.
What kind of dress you want?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // “Hmm, got it.
Y'know I got a friend
that has the same taste as him.
I'll go talk to him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:36}); // “Scary, isn't it?
You just never know when the plate
might come crashing down.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:37}); // “Yeah.
I'd like to climb up to the
plate if I could.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:36}); // “Scary, isn't it?
You just never know when the plate
might come crashing down.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:37}); // “Yeah.
I'd like to climb up to the
plate if I could.”

dialogStrings: Bar

“HEY…someone's IN here…
Don't look!”

“Got any medicine on you?
I'm too hyper…and…ugh.”
“What…urk…”

{CHOICE}Give her medicine
{CHOICE}Don't give her it

“Huh?
You'll really give me some?
Thanks.”

“Phew, I feel better now.
This is for your kindness.”

“What is this?
Oh well.”

“It didn't do a thing,
but thanks anyways.
Here, this is for your kindness.”

{Aeris}
“Wasn't there a Pharmacy here?”
Received Key Item "Cologne"!
Received Key Item "Flower Cologne"!
Received Key Item "Sexy Cologne"!

“Hey, could you do somethin' for me?
Someone's been in there all day
and they're not comin' out.
I can't hold it anymore!”
“Whoops!”

“Yes? If you want to order,
do it at the counter.”

“Man,
times are bad.”

{Aeris}
“Excuse us, are you the father of
the girl at the Clothing Store?”

“I own the Clothes Shop…
but I ain't your father.”

{Aeris}
“I didn't say that…”

{Cloud}
“Make me some clothes.”

“I don't make men's clothes.
And I don't feel like makin'
anything right now.”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud},
you wait over there for a second.
I'll try and talk to him.”{PAUSE}“Why don't you go over there
and have something to drink.”

{Aeris}
“You know, Mister.”{PAUSE}“He always said that just once,
he'd like to dress up like a girl.”{PAUSE}“So, that's why I wanted
a cute dress for him…”

“What!?
A tough lookin' guy like that?”

{Aeris}
“So, how 'bout it?
Will you make him one?”

“…might be interesting.
I was gettin' a little bored
just makin' regular clothes.”

{Aeris}
“Then you'll do it for us?”

“Yeah, all right.
What kind of dress you want?”

{Aeris}
“Something…”
{CHOICE}That feels clean
{CHOICE}That feels soft
“hm, hm, hm, and?”

{Aeris}
“And something…”
{CHOICE}shiny
{CHOICE}that shimmers

“Hmm, got it.
Y'know I got a friend
that has the same taste as him.
I'll go talk to him.”

“Hey, hold on.
Wait till I get an image in my head.
Gulp…ummm, that's good.”
“…And then?”
“Hmm, hmmm, oh really?”

“Scary, isn't it?
You just never know when the plate
might come crashing down.”

“Yeah.
I'd like to climb up to the
plate if I could.”
